quality_assessment: Excellent comprehensive examples page with accurate source references, validated cross-links, and effective use of MkDocs Material features
positive_aspects: Comprehensive quick reference table mapping use cases to examples with key features
Well-organized progression from simple to advanced examples (13 examples total)
Excellent use of MkDocs Material features: admonitions (!!! example, note, tip, warning), code annotations, tabbed content (===)
Accurate source code references verified against actual implementation (CircuitBreakerConfig at error_policy.rs:46-88, BackoffStrategy at retry_v2.rs:70-98)
Clear visual diagrams using Mermaid (MapReduce flow diagram, circuit breaker state machine)
Detailed explanations of complex features (validation lifecycle, JSONPath patterns, backoff strategies)
All internal cross-references are valid (workflow-basics/error-handling.md, mapreduce/backoff-strategies.md)
Good coverage of both standard and MapReduce workflow modes
Version verification header noting last verification date and commit
Effective use of code annotations (numbered callouts) for explaining YAML configuration
Comprehensive troubleshooting sections for MapReduce cleanup and debugging
Clear documentation of preview features (workflow composition) with current status and workarounds
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding a summary/conclusion section at the end to tie examples together
Could add more cross-references to the detailed documentation pages for each feature area
Example 8 (write_file) could benefit from a brief explanation of when to use each format option

topics_covered: MapReduce with error handling and DLQ
advanced features (nested handlers, git context variables)
metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
